name: Royal Tumble
description: Can you build a castle worthy of King Ono? Succeed and you'll be showered in gold coins, fail and your King might be in for a royal flight.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.50 GHz / AMD Phenom II X3 B73 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
